skills.skill: Knowledge of latest technology and devices

duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed monthly sales goals, including wireless sales
Ensure a great customer experience and educate and engage customers through product demonstrations
Be a team player and maintain strong knowledge of all TV, internet, and wireless products, pricing plans, promotions, and service features
Thrive in a fast-paced team environment and lift up to 35 lbs.
Stand for prolonged periods of time and wear a required uniform
